Line3.7FA05: I know that glow. It's the soulstone.
VoiceDir5.7FA05: curious, seeing something glowing beneath Prava
VoiceDir3.7FA05: Nearby, Donan sees the glow of the soulstone from beneath a dead Knight Penitent. He knows what it is--he's familiar with the soulstone.
Line7.6DE47: It's Prava. Even she didn't survive this.
